BASIC_CASE_INFORMATION.citation: Kenya Power And Lighting Company Limited v Patrick Njane Mbugua another [2020] eKLR
BASIC_CASE_INFORMATION.subject_matter: Negligence and vicarious liability in a road traffic accident.

PARTIES.plaintiff_appellant: Kenya Power and Lighting Company Limited

LEGAL_ISSUES.key_legal_issues: Ownership and liability for the accident.

LEGAL_PRINCIPLES.legal_principles_established: Vicarious liability and ownership in tort law.
LEGAL_PRINCIPLES.precedent_value: The case reinforces the application of vicarious liability.

PROCEDURAL_ASPECTS.procedural_history: Accident on 25th November 2007, trial court judgment on 27th January 2016, appeal filed subsequently.
